```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}

```

```{r confint.acf, cache = TRUE}
air.acf <- acf(AirPassengers, plot = FALSE)
ggfortify:::confint.acf(air.acf)
ggfortify:::confint.acf(air.acf, ci.type = 'ma')
```
